metadata.description: Dinosaurs roamed the earth but massive, prehistoric sharks owned the seas! Enjoy this graphic novel's unique blast from the past as the ancestors of today's shark are brought to life again. See what types of shark used to inhabit the prehistoric world of dinosaurs and just how they survived in such a dangerous place. Find out what types of prehistoric creatures they hunted, and which ones hunted them!
metadata.name: Megalodon & Prehistoric Sharks
